Ui:
---------------------------------GENERAL FRAMES----------------------------------------------------------------
VCB_CONSOLIDATED_SCROLLFRAME_ENTRY(this)
VCB_BANNED_SCROLLFRAME_ENTRY(this)
if (this.aide) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
GameTooltip:Hide()
---------------------------------MAIN CONFIG FRAME----------------------------------------------------------------
-- Border of the main frame
this:StartMoving()
this:StopMovingOrSizing()
PlaySound("igCharacterInfoOpen")
PlaySound("igCharacterInfoClose")
VCB_OnEvent(event)
VCB_OnLoad()
-- Title block
-- Title text
-- Close button
getglobal("VCB_BF_ConfigFrame"):Hide() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("Close configuration frame", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
-- Lock button
VCB_BF_ToggleLock() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("Lock VCB", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
-- Minimap button
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("Toggle MiniMap button", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
-- Menu Head
-- Menu Head title
-- Menu body
-- Button 1
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_CONSOLIDATED_FRAME", "Consolidated Buffs")
-- Button Title
-- Button 2
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_BANNED_FRAME", "Banned Buffs")
-- Button Title
-- Button 3
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME", "Timer")
-- Button Title
-- Button 4
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_CF_FRAME", "Consolidated Frame")
-- Button Title
-- Button 5
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_CF_COLOR_FRAME", "Consolidated Frames - Color Settings")
-- Button Title
-- Button 6
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_BF_FRAME", "Buff Frame")
-- Button Title
-- Button 7
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_BF_COLOR_FRAME", "Buff Frame - Color Settings")
-- Button Title
-- Button 8
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_DBF_FRAME", "Debuff Frame")
-- Button Title
-- Button 9
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_DBF_COLOR_FRAME", "Debuff Frames - Color Settings")
-- Button Title
-- Button 10
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_MISC_FRAME", "Miscellaneous")
-- Button Title
-- Button 11
VCB_OPTIONS_HIDE_ALL() VCB_OPTIONS_SHOW("VCB_BF_ABOUT_FRAME", "About VCB")
-- Button Title
-- Title Frame
-- Consolidated Frame
-- Button ADD
VCB_CONSOLIDATED_BUFFS_ADD() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
-- Button DELETE
VCB_CONSOLIDATED_BUFFS_DELETE() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
-- Button Remove all
VCB_CONSOLIDATED_BUFFS_REMOVE_ALL() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(40, VCB_BF_CONSOLIDATED_FRAME_RIGHT_SCROLLFRAME_Update)
VCB_BF_CONSOLIDATED_FRAME_RIGHT_SCROLLFRAME_Update()
-- Banned Frame
-- Button ADD
VCB_BANNED_BUFFS_ADD() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
-- Button DELETE
VCB_BANNED_BUFFS_DELETE() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
-- Button Remove all
VCB_BANNED_BUFFS_REMOVE_ALL() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
-- Button Title
FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(40, VCB_BF_BANNED_FRAME_RIGHT_SCROLLFRAME_Update)
VCB_BF_BANNED_FRAME_RIGHT_SCROLLFRAME_Update()
-- Timer Frame
this.tooltipText = "Check this to format the timer to hours if more than 3600s are left." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON1Text"):SetText("Show hours")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_HOURS()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to show both hours and minutes. For example: 1:34h." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON2Text"):SetText("Show hours and minutes (h:m)")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_HOURS_CONVERT()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to format the timer to minutes if more than 60s are left." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON3Text"):SetText("Show minutes")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_MINUTES()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to show both minutes and seconds. For example: 10:24m." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON4Text"):SetText("Show minutes and seconds (m:s)")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_MINUTES_CONVERT()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to show tenths. For example: 10:44s." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON5Text"):SetText("Show tenth the last 60 seconds")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON("Timer_tenth")
this.tooltipText = "Check this to round down the timer. For example: 70s -> 1m." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON6Text"):SetText("Round down")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_ROUND()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to round up the timer. For example: 70s -> 2m." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON7Text"):SetText("Round up")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_ROUND()
this.tooltipText = "Check this to outline the font with a border." getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_CHECKBUTTON8Text"):SetText("Border (color can be changed in the frame settings)")
VCB_BF_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_BORDER()
this.aide = "Move this to change the font size." this:SetMinMaxValues(1,24) this:SetValue(12) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_SizeSliderText"):SetText("Font size") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_SizeSliderLow"):SetText("1") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_SizeSliderHigh"):SetText("24")
if VCB_IS_LOADED then VCB_BF_VCB_BF_SizeSlider(this) end
this.aide = "Move this to change the font." this:SetMinMaxValues(1,4) this:SetValue(1) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_FontSliderText"):SetText("Font") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_FontSliderLow"):SetText("1") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_FontSliderHigh"):SetText("4")
if VCB_IS_LOADED then VCB_BF_VCB_BF_FontSlider(this) end
this.aide = "Move this to change the opacity." this:SetMinMaxValues(0,1.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_AlphaSliderText"):SetText("Alpha") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_AlphaSliderLow"):SetText("0") getglobal("VCB_BF_TIMER_FRAME_AlphaSliderHigh"):SetText("1.0")
if VCB_IS_LOADED then VCB_BF_VCB_BF_AlphaSlider(this) end
